DEMO_123_MSG_010:
́Alright, alright! Now that everyone's here... 
Let's give 'er a whirl!
DEMO_123_MSG_020:
́Alright... I'm guessin' now you'll be able to fuse yer monsters anytime ya want. Just lemme know, and I'll help ya set it up.
ā
DEMO_123_MSG_100: ̅My goodness... Lucia must still be alive, then... If that's the case. ȁ, I've one final request to make of you.
DEMO_123_MSG_030: ́An' remember... the result of yer fused monsters is gonna get a fresh start, all the way back at Level 1.
DEMO_123_MSG_110:
̅When you finally meet with Lucia, ȁ... I simply need you to let her know this...
ā
DEMO_123_MSG_040:
̅Hmm, interesting indeed... immediately after a fusion they'll be rather weak, and require some training.
ā
DEMO_123_MSG_120: ̅That we Nochoro will be here, waiting and protecting the Centre Building until the humans have returned home.
DEMO_123_MSG_050: ̅Make sure you thoroughly consider the balance of your team prior to fusing them all into underleveled monsters.
DEMO_123_MSG_060:
́Speakin' o' which, ya'll are headin' to Spirit Road next, ain't that right? That recordin' said to seek out Lucia there, right?
ā
DEMO_123_MSG_070: ́Go fire up that Transportation Device on the western side of the building anytime, and it'll shoot ya right over there.
DEMO_123_MSG_080:
̅Gasp! Wait a minute, Ace! Lucia... are you speaking of
the leader of the Resistance!?
DEMO_123_MSG_090: ́I sure am. Apparently, she's waitin' for ȁ and company to find her so she can guide him on his way.
